title: ellAm taruvan
sahitya:
ellAm taruvan bhayamillAmal varuvAi nI pollAk-kurumbu sheyyum kallAk-kurangu nenjE


anupallavi

  ellA vaLamum tarum nallEri shUzhndirukkum pallOr vaNangum tirup-pazhaniyil vAzh murugan


caraNam    dEvar tudikkum malai ten pANDi nATTu malai mUvar pugazhum malai muttiyai aLikkumalai
kAvaDigaL tUkkiyenrum mEviDu-manEkabattar tUvaDivu kANum malait-tOnru shiva SaNmukhanE
